citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00AM on
23-Oct-17.Inspector knocked at the door at the animal facility address and received no answer. The inspector
waited 30 min in front of the facility. The inspector then drove to the Licensee's residence address and knocked on
the door. The inspector then called the number on file and left a message for a return call on the Licensee's
cellphone. The inspector waited 30 minutes in the driveway of the residence before leaving the area.
Lack of availability for inspection inhibits the regulatory process. The licensee must ensure a
knowledgeable,responsible adult is available during regular hours to accompany inspection.

narrative:
